haxegui

haxegui.utils.ScriptStandardLibrary

type
class
available in
flash9
Functions for setting up a scripting environment with standard libraries.

Static Methods

keyboard() : Dynamic
set(interp : hscript.Interp) : Void

Static Methods Details

private keyboard() : Dynamic

public set(interp : hscript.Interp) : Void

Sets all the exported library methods to the given interpreter.

The haxegui package is exported without the "haxegui" prefix.

Example

This should have any extra info on the class and its usage, as well as a small xml example and its result below.

Javascript must be enabled in the browser.
